page.title: 09The vicar of Wye
page.content: Canon David Marriott is the vicar of Wye. He is also the vicar of Brookand he is chairman of Wye School and of Brook School. He is very interested in India and he goes there every year.He collects money for India and all the people of Wye and Brook help him with this. He spends his days reading the bible and taking church services and visiting sick people. Every day after school he takes a youth group and he sometimes takes them away for aweekend and sometimes he takes them to Capel. During the holidays he takes youth groups to Wales or to the Lake District. He is one of the twenty canons of the cathedral in Canterbury.
